body_html: np.stack doesn't seem to broadcast either: https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.stack.html so for consistency it is better for torch.stack to not as well. In addition, allowing broadcasting might lead to a lot of silent bugs for users.

body: np.stack doesn't seem to broadcast either: https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.stack.html so for consistency it is better for torch.stack to not as well. In addition, allowing broadcasting might lead to a lot of silent bugs for users.
